TopicTitle: Terrain not loading quick save/revert bug.

Articles.Content:
KSP: OS X 0.90

Problem: Upon quick saving or reverting, half of Kerbin disappears, only the root part remains visible, and all motion stops until pausing and then unpausing.

Mods installed:

Toolbar

ATM

Dmagic Orbital Science

KER

P-Fairings

RealChute

ScanSat (Dev 9.0rc4)

KAC

Tweakscale

VenStockRevamp 1.6

MM

Reproduction steps:

Build a craft in the SPH with the Mk.1 pod and Mk.1 inline cockpit. Launch it, then revert to launch and the bug should appear.

Screenshots:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Player.log: Log.
Have seen the same bug on windows. open up the settings screen and hit apply or accept and it should correct the res issues. at least that is what works for me.
